column1: Uchi////Uchi remains at the top of the Houston fine-dining experience
column2: as it should. The flavors are exciting
column4: but without getting too crazy or experimental. Some of the most tried-and-true flavors (ones that have been around for as long as I've been going to Uchi) are still my favorites! Although the best way to go is still the Omakase (i.e.
